title: reinstall XP in the same folder, from usb to harddisk

forumNotes.author: arquerox
forumNotes.content:
Hello from Spain... I would apreciate some info for change .SIF files created with MULTIBOOT USB package for using the xp usb installation setup to repair and reinstall in the same letter, the same folder, an existing installation of Xp, from usb pendrive.
Regards.

Pd.- My installation made by USb Multiboot 10 package cannot see an existing installation, ONLY ADD new to boot.ini.
